Home_Page_Chat_Configuration_Note: Enable/Disable receiving unread message count updates from Intercom in mobile app
Access_Token_note: To access the Intercom API, youâ€™ll need an access token. You can find your Access Token in the Configure > Authentication section in your app within the Developer Hub.
Are_You_Sure_First_Line: Are you sure you want to disable online updates? This will
Are_You_Sure_Second_Line: remove unread message indication in the mobile app!
Before_Disable_Online_Message: Are you sure you want to remove the configuration?
Chat_Color_Picker_Note: Define the color of the chat icon to indicate unread messages
Block_Settings_Table_Note: Configure the profiles and pages that will view the chat in the mobile app.
Secret_Key_Note: Paste the secret key from Identity verification for web page on your Intercom settings
Launcher_Note: The state of the default launcher icon. Visible will show on page bottom right Hidden will hide the launcher
On_Load_Note: Decide which action to perform when the widget is loaded
On_Hide_Note: Decide which action to perform when the user closes the widget
